pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Jolly Good Reference Frontend is the simplest possible frontend for The Jolly Good API. It is intended to remain this way, and to avoid unnecessary feature creep, ensuring that it is easy to learn from. In order to deliver a smooth and enjoyable experience, a few slightly more advanced features are required. In these instances, effort has been taken to ensure readability and understandability of the code that implements these concepts.
